sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { createProfile } from '../../actions/profile'; export const withRouter = (Component) =>{ const Wrapper = (props) =>{ const history = useNavigate(); return } return Wrapper; } const CreateProfile = ({ createProfile, history }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '', }); const [displaySocialInputs, toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram } = formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); createProfile(formData, history) } return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
onSubmit(e)}>
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
onChange(e)} /> Could be your own company or one you work for
onChange(e)} /> Could be your own or a company website
onChange(e)} /> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onChange(e)} /> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onChange(e)} /> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{ displaySocialInputs ?
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
: <> } Go Back
) } CreateProfile.propTypes = { createProfile: PropTypes.func.isRequired, } export default connect(null, { createProfile } )(withRouter(CreateProfile));
